  • Vision

    To be the primary choice for agile transformation consulting, leveraging IT investments

  • Values

    We enable organization agility through digital transformation

  • Philosophy

    Business is like a flowing stream and leaves flowing in the stream are services or products. Obstacles hinder the smooth flow of the leaves, demanding removal of such obstacles, or altering the path of the stream as a priority to ensure a smooth business stream flow

  • Consult with us

    Get your business diagnosed and pain points removed by our team

What We Do?

  • We help organizations identify agile transformation opportunities

  • We enable business value stream agile transformation through our portfolio of products and services

  • We assist organizations eliminate pain points in part or all areas of their business value stream by laying an agile foundation

  • We facilitate value realization of organizations IT investments enabling them tackle disruptions in an agile way

How We Do It?

  • Decision Value Stream

    • View “past” performance and measure baseline.
    • Visualize “future” - targeted KPIs, OKRs and how performance should be measured and reported
    • Enable “present” tools and technologies to analyze data for agile decision making

  • Operational Value Stream

    • View how work is done in the “past”
    • Predict how work will be done, and possible disruptions in the “future”
    • Enable “present” tools and technologies to realize the future vision

  • Product / Service Delivery Value Stream

    • View how services were delivered in the “past”
    • Predict customer expectations in the “future”
    • Enable “present” tools and technologies to meet customer expectations now and in the future, in an agile way

About Us

Timestream Group initially started its journey from UK as a software and services consulting firm that was serving some big brands in the UK Banking and Retail industry by one of our directors.

Our model is simply focused on building an Agile foundation for organizations and help them transform their business into the digital world by using our software solutions and System integration services and methodologies.

Timestream Group has opened its first office in the UAE with a mission to expand global brand recognition in B2B technology. 


Timestream is partnered with Software AG - Germany, Business Agility Institute - USA, Be Agile – South Africa, Avanza Solutions UAE, TPS UAE, Tree House UAE, SPS-Net USA, VUCA - World, Germany and many more in the roadmap to enable us deliver strong solutions and consulting services to our partners and their customers.  

Our core expertise are:

  • Consulting & CX/UX Design Services (Global Benchmark)
  • Software Solutions for the Digital world (Timestream IPs)
  • System Integration & Product development Services (Customer IP)
